title: The Vast Landscape
description: Librarian's note: There is an Alternate Cover Edition for this edition of this book here.Bold contemporary fiction, The Vast Landscape shares one womanâ€™s journey filled with doubt, mistrust, fame, and self-discovery. Join Harrison on her quest to find inner peace despite the harrowing obstacles placed in her way. Will she succeed in stripping away her complex armor to unmask the flawed, beautiful, and strong iconoclast kept hidden for so long? Honest to a fault, Jacqueline Cioffa creates a challenging love story sparkling with narrative originality.
author: Jacqueline Cioffa
